Html: I have an existing XBAP in WPF. I would like to incorporate the look and feel of Modern UI. It seems that I would have to change the Page object in XAML to an mui object. Will this affect my ability to access the app online?

You won't be able to use the ModernWindow in a XBAP app. This means that you will need to move all presentation logic (rendering of menu's, use of frames) from ModernWindow to a usercontrol. Apart from that XBAP will work just fine with MUI.

If you are not interested in the navigation aspects of MUI, you can easily just incorporate the styles of MUI into your app.
